sentences.english: He described the scene to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我描述了那个情景。

sentences.english: He telegraphed me to go to the party.
sentences.chinese: 他发电报要我去参加那个聚会。

sentences.english: The world exists, whether you like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管你喜欢与否，这个世界照样存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更加（用于比较级，最高级前）
detailed_translations.english: used before two  comparative  adjectives or adverbs to show that the degree of one event or situation is related to the degree of another one

sentences.english: the back of the house
sentences.chinese: 房子的后部

sentences.english: the last scene of the movie
sentences.chinese: 电影的最后一个场景

sentences.english: the end of the day
sentences.chinese: 一天的末了

sentences.english: to be proud of sth
sentences.chinese: 为某事自豪

detailed_translations.english: used to show what a part belongs to or comes from

sentences.english: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 他去买炸鱼薯条了。

sentences.english: The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.english: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.english: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他弹吉他唱民歌。

sentences.english: I missed supper and I’m starving!
sentences.chinese: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

detailed_translations.english: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: We have a problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们遇到了一个麻烦。

sentences.english: There was a hole in the fence.
sentences.chinese: 篱笆上有一个洞。

sentences.english: Suddenly they heard a loud bang.
sentences.chinese: 他们突然听到砰的一声巨响。

sentences.english: I get paid once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资一个月发一次。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you are talking about someone or something that has not been mentioned before, or that your listener does not know about

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

sentences.english: I’ve got a present for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有件礼物送给你。

sentences.english: Someone left a message for Vicky.
sentences.chinese: 有人给维基留了言。

sentences.english: an English course for foreign students
sentences.chinese: 为外国学生开的一门英语课程

sentences.english: WWhat did you do that for?
sentences.chinese: 你那样做是为了什么？

sentences.english: We could hardly see for the mist.
sentences.chinese: 由于雾气，我们几乎什么也看不见。

detailed_translations.english: used to say who is intended to get or use something, or where something is intended to be used

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: Don’t disturb me while I’m working.
sentences.chinese: 我工作的时候不要打扰我。

sentences.english: Gemma was reading.
sentences.chinese: 吉玛正在看书。

sentences.english: They’ve been asking a lot of questions.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经问了许多问题。

sentences.english: That guy’s always causing trouble.
sentences.chinese: 那家伙总是惹麻烦。

sentences.english: We’ll be starting in about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们过一小时左右开始。

sentences.english: He isn’t leaving, is he?
sentences.chinese: 他不会走吧？

detailed_translations.english: used with a present participle to form the  continuous 4  tenses of verbs

sentences.english: I wanted to punch him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 我真想一拳打到他鼻子上。

sentences.english: Matt kissed her on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 马特亲吻了她的脸颊。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.english: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把护照带着。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

sentences.english: ...fruits and vegetables that will be canned, skinned, diced, or otherwise processed.
sentences.chinese: …将要经过装罐、去皮、切块或其他加工程序的水果和蔬菜。

detailed_translations.english: When food or drink is canned, it is put into a metal container and sealed so that it will remain fresh.

sentences.english: Our guests have arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我们的客人到了。

sentences.english: Has anyone phoned?
sentences.chinese: 有人打过电话来吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.english: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 我已经15年没见他了。

sentences.english: ‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.chinese: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.english: You haven’t done much, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你没做多少，是吗？

sentences.english: They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.english: She sat down and had another drink.
sentences.chinese: 她坐下来又喝了一杯。

detailed_translations.chinese: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
detailed_translations.english: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say that someone owns something or that it is available for them to use

sentences.english: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.english: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
sentences.chinese: 她站在窗边。

sentences.english: I was attacked by a dog.
sentences.chinese: 我被一条狗袭击。

sentences.english: a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

sentences.english: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.english: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.chinese: 她为人不太好。

sentences.english: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.chinese: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.english: ‘Can we go to the park?’ ‘No, not today, dear.’
sentences.chinese: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

detailed_translations.english: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

sentences.english: They live at 18 Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在维多利亚街18 号。

sentences.english: Does this train stop at Preston?
sentences.chinese: 这列火车在普雷斯顿停吗？

sentences.english: I was waiting at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我在公共汽车站等着。

sentences.english: Liz and her friend sat down at a corner table.
sentences.chinese: 莉兹和她的朋友在靠角落的一张桌子旁坐下。

sentences.english: Turn left at the church.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂那里朝左转。

sentences.english: We’ll meet at Harry’s (=  at Harry’s house  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将在哈里家碰头。

sentences.english: I spent an unpleasant hour at the dentist’s.
sentences.chinese: 我在牙医诊所度过了难熬的一小时。

sentences.english: The film starts at 8 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 电影8点钟开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to say exactly where something or someone is, or where something happens

sentences.english: I'm from Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我是意大利人。

detailed_translations.english: used to show what the origin of sb/sth is

sentences.english: I moved to this city six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.english: I’m not late again, am I?
sentences.chinese: 我没有又迟到吧？

sentences.english: My husband and I enjoy going to the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: I have no more questions.
sentences.chinese: 我没问题了。

sentences.english: The film deserves more attention from the public.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片应受到公众的更多注意。

sentences.english: The accident taught him to be more careful.
sentences.chinese: 这起事故的教训使他变得更小心。

detailed_translations.english: a greater amount or number
having a particular quality to a greater degree

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.english: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened

sentences.english: I’ve just made a pot of coffee. Would you like some?
sentences.chinese: 我刚煮了一壶咖啡，你想喝点吗？

sentences.english: ‘Do you know where the screws are?’ ‘There are some in the garage.’
sentences.chinese: “你知道螺丝钉在哪儿吗？”“车库里有一些。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 一些；某个；大约；相当多的
一些；若干；其中的一部分；（数量不确切时用）有些人
detailed_translations.english: a number of people or things or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
a fairly large number or amount of something

sentences.english: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.english: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.english: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.english: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.english: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.english: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.chinese: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.english: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.english: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.chinese: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
detailed_translations.english: in or to a particular place that is not where you are
used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do

sentences.english: Show me what you bought.
sentences.chinese: 给我看看你买的东西。

sentences.english: What he did was morally wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为很缺德。

detailed_translations.english: the thing which

sentences.english: a book about politics
sentences.chinese: 一本有关政治的书

sentences.english: She said something about leaving town.
sentences.chinese: 她说了些要离开镇子的话。

sentences.english: He lied about his age.
sentences.chinese: 他谎报年龄。

sentences.english: About that car of yours. How much are you selling it for?
sentences.chinese: 说到你的那辆车，你打算卖什么价钱？

sentences.english: What’s he on about (=  talking about  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 他在说什么呀？

sentences.english: It’s about Tommy, doctor. He’s been sick again.
sentences.chinese: 医生，是汤米，他又病了。

sentences.english: Jo sensed fear and jealousy all about her.
sentences.chinese: 乔感觉她周围充满恐惧和嫉妒。

detailed_translations.english: concerning or relating to a particular subject

sentences.english: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.chinese: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.english: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.chinese: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.english: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.english: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.english: When will the work be finished?
sentences.chinese: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.english: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

sentences.english: They had one daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一个女儿。

sentences.english: one hundred and twenty-one pounds
sentences.chinese: 121英镑

sentences.english: Come back at one (= one o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 1点钟回来。

sentences.english: Katie’s almost one (= one year old ).
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂快满一岁了。

sentences.english: The children seemed upset. One was crying.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子好像不开心，有一个在哭。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1
used to refer to a member of a group or pair of people or things

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

sentences.english: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.chinese: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.english: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.chinese: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.english: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

sentences.english: My girlfriend was also called Helen.
sentences.chinese: 我的女朋友也叫海伦。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to something else that you have mentioned

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

sentences.english: Among his many hobbies was the breeding of fine horses.
sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.chinese: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of people or things
many people

sentences.english: ‘Will Kay come?’ ‘She may do.’
sentences.chinese: “凯来吗？” “或许吧。”

sentences.english: So now you know as much as I do.
sentences.chinese: 那么现在你知道的和我一样多了。

sentences.english: ‘You forgot all about it.’ ‘No, I didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你把这事忘记得一干二净。” “没有，我没忘记。”

sentences.english: ‘I want to go home.’ ‘So do I.’
sentences.chinese: “我想回家。” “我也是。”

sentences.english: I didn’t believe the story and neither did he.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信这个故事，他也不信。

detailed_translations.english: used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used
used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used

sentences.english: Which class has the most children in it?
sentences.chinese: 哪个班级孩子最多？

sentences.english: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.chinese: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

detailed_translations.english: a larger amount or number than anyone or anything else
having the greatest amount of a particular quality

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

sentences.english: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.chinese: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.english: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.chinese: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: ‘Did you go into the supermarket?’ ‘No, we didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你们进超级市场了吗？”“我们没有进去。”

sentences.english: Shall we stop for a coffee?
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来喝杯咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: So we all travelled down to Brighton together.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们一起都去了布赖顿。

sentences.english: We declare our support for a government of national unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣布支持一个全国统一的政府。

sentences.english: We Italians are proud of our history.
sentences.chinese: 我们意大利人为自己的历史感到自豪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.english: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.english: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.english: I like my coffee quite weak.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.english: I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.english: I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

sentences.english: Would you like a drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝一杯吗？

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

sentences.english: Can I use your phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.english: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.chinese: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.english: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.english: Use your imagination when planning meals.
sentences.chinese: 安排三餐时要动点脑筋。

sentences.english: She booked the flight using a false name.
sentences.chinese: 她用化名预订了航班。

detailed_translations.english: if you use a particular tool, method, service, ability etc, you do something with that tool, by means of that method etc, for a particular purpose

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用， 应用； 用途， 效用
detailed_translations.english: the action or fact of using something

sentences.english: Come into the office.
sentences.chinese: 到办公室里来。

sentences.english: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.english: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.english: Sue got back into bed and pulled the quilt over her head.
sentences.chinese: 休回到床上，拉过被子蒙住头。

sentences.english: I’ve got to go into town this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我今天上午得进城去。

sentences.english: We dived into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们跳进海里。

detailed_translations.english: to the inside or inner part of a container, place, area etc

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.english: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.english: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

sentences.english: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.english: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.english: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.english: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.english: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.english: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.english: Are you sure you should be up?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你该起床了吗?

sentences.english: These days they were up at the crack of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 这些天他们在破晓时就起床。

detailed_translations.english: towards a higher place or position
If you are up, you are not in bed

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

sentences.english: We didn’t enjoy the day because the weather was so awful.
sentences.chinese: 那天我们很不尽兴，因为天气实在太糟。

sentences.english: ‘Why can’t I go?’ ‘Because you’re not old enough.’
sentences.chinese: “我为什么不能去？”“因为你年纪太小。”

sentences.english: Hubert never experienced any fear, and this was partly because he was not particularly intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 休伯特从来都没有害怕的感觉，部分原因是他这人不大聪明。

sentences.english: Many exam candidates lose marks simply because they do not read the questions properly.
sentences.chinese: 许多应试者失分只是因为没有好好地读题。

sentences.english: I decided to go with them, mainly because I had nothing better to do.
sentences.chinese: 我决定和他们一起去，主要是因为我没有更好的事情可做。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are giving the reason for something

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

sentences.english: We need to get help quickly!
sentences.chinese: 我们需要马上得到帮助！

sentences.english: It would be a good idea to get professional advice.
sentences.chinese: 征求专业人士的意见，这个主意很好。

sentences.english: You may be able to get a grant from the local authority.
sentences.chinese: 你也许可以从当地政府获得拨款。

sentences.english: He cleared his throat to get our attention.
sentences.chinese: 他清清嗓子来引起我们的注意。

sentences.english: What time will we get there?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候可以到那里？

sentences.english: We got to Paris that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我们到了巴黎。

sentences.english: She soon got bored with the job.
sentences.chinese: 她不久就厌倦了这份工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 获得，得到；到达；变成，成为
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.chinese: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.english: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

sentences.english: the city’s new hospital
sentences.chinese: 市里新建的医院

sentences.english: the new issue of ‘Time’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 新一期《时代周刊》

sentences.english: new products on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上的新产品

sentences.english: The hardest part of this job is understanding the new technology.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作最难的地方是理解新技术。

sentences.english: a young man with new ideas
sentences.chinese: 一个有新观念的年轻人

detailed_translations.english: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.chinese: 水面上的一层油

detailed_translations.english: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television

sentences.english: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.english: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.english: She looks just like her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.english: It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.english: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.chinese: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

detailed_translations.english: exactly

sentences.english: Naomi was only 17 when she got married.
sentences.chinese: 娜奥米结婚时才17岁。

sentences.english: There are only a few cars on the island.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛上只有几辆汽车。

sentences.english: It’s only eight o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 才8点钟。

sentences.english: I was the only woman there.
sentences.chinese: 我是那里唯一的女性。

detailed_translations.english: not more than a particular number, age etc
used to say that there is one person, thing, or group in a particular situation and no others

sentences.english: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.english: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.english: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.english: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.english: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.english: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.chinese: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

sentences.english: a good hotel
sentences.chinese: 一家不错的宾馆

sentences.english: good quality cloth
sentences.chinese: 优质布料

sentences.english: The train service is not very good.
sentences.chinese: 火车服务不是很好。

sentences.english: My French is better than my Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 我的法语比西班牙语好。

sentences.english: Alex is very good at languages.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯在语言方面很擅长。

sentences.english: She’s a very good player.
sentences.chinese: 她是一名非常优秀的球员。

detailed_translations.english: of a high standard or quality

sentences.english: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.english: Does anyone want a drink of water?
sentences.chinese: 有谁想喝杯水吗？

sentences.english: a glass of sparkling mineral water
sentences.chinese: 一杯有气矿泉水

sentences.english: All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.chinese: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.english: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.chinese: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.english: a fresh water spring
sentences.chinese: 淡水泉

sentences.english: When dealing with a burst pipe, always turn off the water first.
sentences.chinese: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.english: contamination of the local water supply
sentences.chinese: 当地供水受到污染

sentences.english: Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.chinese: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.english: The garden needs watering daily.
sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

sentences.english: You don’t really need a car.
sentences.chinese: 你其实并不需要一辆车。

sentences.english: Plants need light in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要光才能存活。

sentences.english: The camcorder needs a new battery.
sentences.chinese: 这台摄像机需要一块新电池。

sentences.english: Are you sure that you have everything you need?
sentences.chinese: 你确定需要的都有了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them
to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

sentences.english: It feels very cold today.
sentences.chinese: 今天很冷。

sentences.english: The fishing industry is very important to the area.
sentences.chinese: 捕鱼业对于该地区非常重要。

sentences.english: The traffic’s moving very slowly this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上车流非常缓慢。

sentences.english: problems that are very similar to mine
sentences.chinese: 和我非常相似的问题

sentences.english: I feel a lot better – thank you very much.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉好多了，非常感谢。

sentences.english: I’m very, very (= used for emphasis ) pleased you can come.
sentences.chinese: 你能来我真是非常高兴。

sentences.english: It’s very kind of you to help.
sentences.chinese: 您来帮忙真是太好了。

sentences.english: My sister and I were married on the very same (= exactly the same ) day.
sentences.chinese: 我和姐姐在同一天结婚。

sentences.english: He died in this very room.
sentences.chinese: 他就是在这个房间里去世的。

sentences.english: I’ll start at the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我要从头开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize an adjective, adverb, or phrase
used to emphasize that you are talking exactly about one particular thing or person

sentences.english: Have you got any money?
sentences.chinese: 你身上有没有钱？

sentences.english: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.
sentences.chinese: 凡违反规定的孩子都要受罚。

detailed_translations.english: some or even the smallest amount or number

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.chinese: 医生会询问你的病历。

detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

sentences.english: She often works at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她周末经常要上班。

sentences.english: If you wash your hair too often, it can get too dry.
sentences.chinese: 如果洗头过勤，头发会变得干枯。

sentences.english: How often do you see your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你隔多久去看你父母？

sentences.english: Robin is a difficult child; you’ve said so yourself often enough (= a lot of times ).
sentences.chinese: 罗宾是个难管的孩子，你自己也常常这么说。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens often, it happens regularly or many times

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art in New York
sentences.chinese: 纽约现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: an example of early Indian art
sentences.chinese: 印度早期艺术的范例

sentences.english: Television is ruining the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 电视在糟蹋会话艺术。

detailed_translations.english: the use of painting, drawing,  sculpture  etc to represent things or express ideas

sentences.english: Who knows the answer?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道答案？

sentences.english: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.english: Didn’t you know that?
sentences.chinese: 你不知道那件事吗？

sentences.english: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.chinese: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.english: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.english: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你想马上知道。

sentences.english: If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.chinese: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.english: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

detailed_translations.english: to have information about something

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

sentences.english: These results are firsts in the history of women’s athletics.
sentences.chinese: 这些成绩在女运动员历史上是第一次。

sentences.english: First I had to decide what to wear.
sentences.chinese: 首先我得决定穿什么。

detailed_translations.english: 1st
at the beginning

sentences.english: Would you shut the window, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把窗户关上，好吗？

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 您在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: Would someone please tell me what is going on?
sentences.chinese: 请问谁能告诉我发生什么事了？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask someone politely to do something

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

sentences.english: They reviewed each aspect of the plan bit by bit.
sentences.chinese: 他们对计划的各个方面逐一地进行了审核。

sentences.english: Will you be home over the summer vacation?
sentences.chinese: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.english: Over a period of ten years he stole a million pounds from the company.
sentences.chinese: 他在10年间从公司偷走了100万英镑。

sentences.english: Can we talk about this over dinner?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否边吃饭边谈这个问题？

detailed_translations.english: during

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: He spent the next fifteen years mapping the Isle of Anglesey.
sentences.chinese: 他在后来的十五年里绘制了安格尔西岛的地图。

detailed_translations.chinese: 映射；计划；绘制地图；确定基因在染色体中的位置
detailed_translations.english: to make a map of a particular area
a drawing of a particular area, for example a city or country, which shows its main features, such as its roads, rivers, mountains etc

sentences.english: I can’t find the car keys.
sentences.chinese: 我找不到汽车钥匙。

sentences.english: Hold on while I find a pen.
sentences.chinese: 别挂电话，我找支笔。

sentences.english: Her body was later found hidden in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 后来有人发现她的尸体被藏在了灌木丛里。

sentences.english: I have to find somewhere else to live.
sentences.chinese: 我得另找住处。

sentences.english: She had almost given up hope of finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 她差不多要放弃找个丈夫的希望了。

sentences.english: Her mother went to the shops, and on her return, Kathleen was nowhere to be found (= could not be found ) .
sentences.chinese: 妈妈去买东西，回来的时候凯思琳找不到了。

detailed_translations.english: to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for

sentences.english: Where are you going?
sentences.chinese: 你要到哪儿去？

sentences.english: Where do they live?
sentences.chinese: 他们住在哪里？

sentences.english: Do you know where my glasses are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的眼镜在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: Where would you like to sit?
sentences.chinese: 你想坐在哪里？

detailed_translations.english: in or to which place

sentences.english: The day ended much as it began.
sentences.chinese: 这一天结束时还像开始时一样。

sentences.english: I don’t have much money with me.
sentences.chinese: 我身上没带很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: by a great amount
a large amount of something

sentences.english: Will you take the job?
sentences.chinese: 你接受这份工作吗？

sentences.english: Do you take American Express?
sentences.chinese: 你们接受美国运通信用卡吗？

sentences.english: If you take my advice , you’ll see a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你听我的意见，就去看医生。

sentences.english: Our helpline take s 3.5 million calls (= telephone calls ) a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的求助热线每年接听350万个电话。

sentences.english: Some doctors are unwilling to take new patients without a referral.
sentences.chinese: 有些医生不愿意接收没有转诊单的新病人。

sentences.english: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.chinese: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.english: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.chinese: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.english: Staff have agreed to take a 2% pay cut.
sentences.chinese: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拿走； 接受， 接纳
detailed_translations.english: to accept or choose something that is offered, suggested, or given to you

sentences.english: I’d like you to line up in twos, please.
sentences.chinese: 请你们两个一组排好队。

detailed_translations.english: in groups of two people or things
the number 2

sentences.english: She spent her life pandering to the wants of her children.
sentences.chinese: 她一生都在设法满足子女的需要。

sentences.english: The gallery closed down for want of funding.
sentences.chinese: 那家画廊由于缺乏资金关闭了。

detailed_translations.english: something that you need or want

sentences.english: a very important meeting
sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.english: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’
sentences.chinese: “你说什么？”“噢，没什么大事。”

sentences.english: It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.chinese: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.english: a very important customer
sentences.chinese: 一位大客户

detailed_translations.english: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future

sentences.english: Do you know the family next door?
sentences.chinese: 你认识隔壁那家人吗？

sentences.english: The Webb family still has its farm over there.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯家依然保留着那里的农场。

sentences.english: The family now live in London.
sentences.chinese: 那家人现居伦敦。

sentences.english: This house isn’t big enough for a family of seven.
sentences.chinese: 这房子住不下七口之家。

sentences.english: My family come from Scotland originally.
sentences.chinese: 我祖籍是苏格兰。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who are related to each other, especially a mother, a father, and their children

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.english: Her courage is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

detailed_translations.english: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

sentences.english: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.english: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.english: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

detailed_translations.english: during the time that something is happening
to spend time in a pleasant and lazy way

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
sentences.chinese: “保罗在哪儿？”“他去看电影了。”

sentences.english: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: We sneaked out while Jessie’s mom wasn’t looking.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁杰茜的妈妈没有看到，偷偷地溜了出去。

sentences.english: If you look carefully you can see that the painting represents a human figure.
sentences.chinese: 如果仔细看，就会看出画上是一个人形。

sentences.english: Gina covered her eyes, afraid to look.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜捂住眼睛，不敢看。

sentences.english: Let me have a look at that – I think it’s mine.
sentences.chinese: 让我看一下那个东西——我想它是我的。

detailed_translations.english: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it
an act of looking at something

sentences.english: The new road should be completed before the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 这条新公路应该在年底前完工。

sentences.english: Let’s meet at our house before the show.
sentences.chinese: 看演出前在我们家碰头吧。

sentences.english: Larry arrived home before me.
sentences.chinese: 拉里在我之前到家。

sentences.english: We only got back from Scotland the day before yesterday (=  two days ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们前天才从苏格兰回来。

sentences.english: Other students joined in the protest, and before long (=  soon  ) there was a crowd of 200 or so.
sentences.chinese: 其他学生也加入了抗议队伍，不久就有200人左右了。

detailed_translations.english: earlier than something or someone

sentences.english: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.english: Thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你的一切帮助。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something by doing part of their work or by giving them something they need
things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

sentences.english: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

sentences.english: Bring your own equipment.
sentences.chinese: 带上你自己的装备。

sentences.english: Every dance has its own rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 每一种舞蹈都有自己的节奏。

sentences.english: The yacht was intended for the King’s own personal use.
sentences.chinese: 这艘游艇是专供国王私用的。

sentences.english: His face was only a few inches from her own.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸离她自己的脸非常近。

sentences.english: The building is owned by the local council.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼归地方议会所有。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something belongs to or is connected with a particular person or thing and not any other
to have something which belongs to you, especially because you have bought it, been given it etc and it is legally yours

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

sentences.english: Students on the course learn about all aspects of business.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程的学生要学习商业活动的各个方面。

sentences.english: Carl began in the music business by running a recording studio.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔是从经营录音棚开始干音乐这一行的。

sentences.english: We do business with a number of Italian companies.
sentences.chinese: 我们和一些意大利公司做生意。

sentences.english: ...recording Ben as he goes about his business.
sentences.chinese: …摄录本做自己的事的样子。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of making money by producing or buying and selling goods, or providing services

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

sentences.english: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

detailed_translations.english: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

sentences.english: Her perfume has always had the same effect on me.
sentences.chinese: 她身上的香水给我的感觉一如既往。

sentences.english: He’s the same old Peter – moody and irritable.
sentences.chinese: 他还是以前那个彼得——喜怒无常且爱发火。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相同的；同一的；上述的（通常与the连用）；无变化的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that a particular person or thing does not change

detailed_translations.chinese: 同样的事物或人（通常与the连用）
detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are exactly like each other
in the same way

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

sentences.english: Why are you crying?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么哭？

sentences.english: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.english: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.chinese: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.chinese: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.chinese: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

sentences.english: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

detailed_translations.english: not many or hardly any people or things

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

sentences.english: If you need more information, you might try the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要更多的信息，可以试试因特网。

sentences.english: I thought we might go to the new Chinese restaurant on the High Street.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以到大街上新开的那家中国餐馆去。

sentences.english: It might be a good idea to put those plants in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 把那些植物放在阴凉处也许是个好主意。

sentences.english: We’re going to a concert. You might like to come with us.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听音乐会，你也许想和我们一起去吧。

detailed_translations.english: if something might happen or might be true, there is a possibility that it may happen or may be true, but you are not at all certain

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true
to think about a problem or question

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

sentences.english: Do you think the music’s too loud?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？

sentences.english: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
sentences.chinese: 你往汤里放盐太多。

sentences.english: There are too many cars on the road.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆太多。

detailed_translations.english: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

sentences.english: I still haven’t finished painting the spare room.
sentences.chinese: 我还没粉刷完那间空房间。

sentences.english: Do you still have Julie’s phone number?
sentences.chinese: 你还留着朱莉的电话号码吗？

detailed_translations.english: up to a particular point in time and continuing at that moment

detailed_translations.chinese: 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的
detailed_translations.english: not moving
a photograph of a scene from a film

detailed_translations.chinese: 蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来

sentences.english: an alarm system
sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

sentences.english: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.english: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.english: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

sentences.english: He won the best actor award.
sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.english: What’s the best way to cook this fish?
sentences.chinese: 这鱼怎么烧最好？

sentences.english: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.english: Our pilots are given the best possible training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.english: We use only the very best ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

sentences.english: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.english: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.chinese: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.english: You must work hard.
sentences.chinese: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.english: We must all be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.english: Must I pay now?
sentences.chinese: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.english: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.chinese: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

detailed_translations.english: to have to do something because it is necessary or important, or because of a law or order

sentences.english: Learning goes on throughout life.
sentences.chinese: 学习是一生的事。

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you.
sentences.chinese: 你前面还有漫长的人生呢。

sentences.english: I’ve known John all my life (= since I was born ).
sentences.chinese: 我从小就认识约翰了。

sentences.english: His main aim in life was to have fun.
sentences.chinese: 他人生的主要目标就是享乐。

sentences.english: It was one of the best days of my life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最快乐的时光之一。

sentences.english: The accident scarred him for life (= for the rest of his life ).
sentences.chinese: 这场事故给他留下了终生的创伤。

sentences.english: She knew she’d feel guilty for the rest of her life.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己将内疚终生。

sentences.english: Raj spent his life caring for others.
sentences.chinese: 拉杰一辈子都在关爱他人。

sentences.english: Bonington spent his entire adult life in France.
sentences.chinese: 博宁顿成年后就一直在法国生活。

sentences.english: We don’t know much about the poet’s early life (= when he was young ).
sentences.chinese: 我们对这位诗人的早年生活所知甚少。

sentences.english: Poor diet can lead to a whole range of diseases in later life (= when you are older ).
sentences.chinese: 饮食不良会在晚年引发各种疾病。

sentences.english: She married late in life (= when she was fairly old ).
sentences.chinese: 她结婚晚。

sentences.english: He’s a life member (= continuing until he dies ) of the club.
sentences.chinese: 他是俱乐部的终身会员。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time when someone is alive

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.english: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.chinese: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.english: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.chinese: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.english: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.english: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.chinese: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.english: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.chinese: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.english: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.chinese: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.english: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.chinese: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.english: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

detailed_translations.english: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time

sentences.english: By the time she was eight, she could read Greek and Latin.
sentences.chinese: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

detailed_translations.english: used as the past tense of ‘can’ to say what someone was able to do or was allowed to do in the past

sentences.english: She's a widow now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在是一个寡妇。

sentences.english: But we are now a much more fragmented society.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

sentences.english: If we leave now we’ll be there before dark.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们现在出发，天黑之前就能赶到那里。

detailed_translations.english: (at) the present time

sentences.english: During the summer she worked as a lifeguard.
sentences.chinese: 夏天她当过救生员。

sentences.english: He slept calmly during the early part of the night.
sentences.chinese: 他上半夜睡得很安稳。

sentences.english: Foxes remain hidden during the day.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸白天一直躲藏着。

detailed_translations.english: from the beginning to the end of a period of time

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

sentences.english: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.chinese: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.english: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.chinese: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光。

sentences.english: We oppose racism in all its forms.
sentences.chinese: 我们反对各种形式的种族主义。

sentences.english: The female form is a thing of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 女性形体是一种美。

sentences.english: The rocks were formed more than 4,000 million years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石是40多亿年前形成的。

detailed_translations.english: the way something is or appears to be
to start to exist, or make something start to exist, especially as the result of a natural process

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

sentences.english: Let’s go outside and get some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去呼吸些新鲜空气吧。

sentences.english: You need to put some air in the tyres.
sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

sentences.english: Flames leapt into the air.
sentences.chinese: 火苗蹿向天空。

sentences.english: He fell 2,000 metres through the air without a parachute.
sentences.chinese: 他没用降落伞在空中下落了2,000米。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of gases around the Earth, that we breathe

sentences.english: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.english: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.chinese: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.english: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.english: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.chinese: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.english: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 24 hours

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.english: I’ve spent the day dashing about from place to place.
sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.english: The place was full of screaming children.
sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

sentences.english: The weather became warmer.
sentences.chinese: 天气变暖和了。

sentences.english: Slowly my eyes became accustomed to the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛渐渐适应了黑暗。

sentences.english: Helen became increasingly anxious about her husband’s strange behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 海伦越来越担心她丈夫的反常行为。

sentences.english: Pollution from cars has become a major problem.
sentences.chinese: 汽车污染已成为严重的问题。

sentences.english: When did you first want to become a teacher?
sentences.chinese: 你最早是什么时候想要当一名教师的？

detailed_translations.english: to start to have a feeling or quality, or to start to develop into something

sentences.english: They wrote various numbers on a large sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.english: Add all the numbers together.
sentences.chinese: 把所有数字加起来。

sentences.english: Answer question number 4.
sentences.chinese: 回答第4题。

detailed_translations.english: a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity

sentences.english: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。

sentences.english: full public access to information
sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权
