sentences.english: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.english: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.english: He is adored by his public.
sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

detailed_translations.english: relating to all the ordinary people in a country, who are not members of the government or do not have important jobs
ordinary people who do not work for the government or have any special position in society

sentences.english: I can’t read your writing.
sentences.chinese: 我看不懂你写的东西。

sentences.english: She picked up the letter and read it.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.english: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.chinese: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.english: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.chinese: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.english: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的书读者很多。

sentences.english: When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

detailed_translations.english: to look at written words and understand what they mean
to look at written words and understand what they mean

sentences.english: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.chinese: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.english: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
sentences.chinese: 你们每天将有一部分时间在户外实际操作。

sentences.english: Lay all the parts out before you start assembling the model.
sentences.chinese: 开始组装模型之前把所有的零件都摆放出来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece or feature of something such as an object, area, event, or period of time

sentences.english: There’s so much to do. I don’t know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.english: She wanted to start her own catering business.
sentences.chinese: 她想自己创立一家餐饮公司。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that you were not doing before, and continue doing it

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

sentences.english: She knows every student in the school.
sentences.chinese: 她认识学校里的每一个学生。

sentences.english: The buses go every 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车每隔10分钟发一班车。

detailed_translations.english: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

sentences.english: The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
sentences.chinese: 这种T恤有小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: a large ovenproof pan
sentences.chinese: 一只耐热的大烤盘

sentences.english: large sums ofmoney
sentences.chinese: 大笔的钱

sentences.english: those who drink large amounts of coffee
sentences.chinese: 咖啡喝得很多的人

sentences.english: A large number of students have signed up for the course.
sentences.chinese: 很多学生报名读这门课程。

detailed_translations.english: big in size, amount, or number

sentences.english: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.chinese: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.english: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.chinese: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

detailed_translations.english: on one occasion only
from the time when something happens

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.english: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可利用的，现有的；可获得的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

sentences.english: David bent down to tie his shoelace.
sentences.chinese: 戴维弯腰系鞋带。

sentences.english: Get down off the table.
sentences.chinese: 从桌子上下来。

sentences.english: Tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 我泪流满面。

sentences.english: The sun was going down and it would soon be dark.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: They came running down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们跑下楼来。

sentences.english: She stood on a balcony looking down into the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 她站在阳台上朝下面的院子望去。

sentences.english: Glancing down the list of runners, I noticed a familiar name.
sentences.chinese: 我往下扫了一眼赛跑选手的名单，注意到了一个熟悉的名字。

sentences.english: Her hair came down to her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发一直垂到腰际。

sentences.english: Ken fell asleep face down (= with his face towards the ground ) on the couch.
sentences.chinese: 肯趴在长沙发上睡着了。

sentences.english: We heard the sound of laughter down below.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到下面有笑声。

sentences.english: The bathroom is down those stairs.
sentences.chinese: 浴室在那段楼梯下面。

detailed_translations.english: to or towards a lower place or position

sentences.english: Researchers were given a £10,000 grant to continue their work.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员得到一万英镑的经费以继续他们的研究。

sentences.english: I’ve got some old diaries that my grandmother gave me years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我有几本旧日记本，是多年前祖母给我的。

sentences.english: I didn’t steal it! Maria gave it to me!
sentences.chinese: 我不是偷的！是玛丽亚给我的！

sentences.english: Most people are willing to give to charity .
sentences.chinese: 大多数人都愿意向慈善事业捐款。

sentences.english: The situation is now desperate, so please give generously .
sentences.chinese: 现在情况危急，请大家慷慨解囊。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have something as a present, or to provide something for someone

sentences.english: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.english: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.chinese: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.english: You usually drinks white wine with fish.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒一般配鱼喝

sentences.english: Dad really loves to fish.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很喜欢钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, and uses its fins and tail to swim
to try to catch fish

sentences.english: There are many different cell types in the human body .
sentences.chinese: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.english: the power of the human mind
sentences.chinese: 人脑的威力

sentences.english: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.chinese: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.english: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.english: theories of human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.english: different areas of human experience
sentences.chinese: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.english: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.chinese: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.english: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.chinese: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.english: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals
a person

sentences.english: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.chinese: 海伦的父母都是医生。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about two people, things etc together, and emphasize that each is included

sentences.english: local hospital
sentences.chinese: 当地医院

sentences.english: local residents
sentences.chinese: 本地居民

sentences.english: a local infection
sentences.chinese: 局部感染

detailed_translations.english: relating to the particular area you live in, or the area you are talking about

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

detailed_translations.english: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct
used to say ‘yes’ to someone

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

detailed_translations.chinese: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候能回家？

detailed_translations.english: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are

sentences.english: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我马上回来。

sentences.english: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.chinese: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.english: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.chinese: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.english: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.chinese: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.english: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.chinese: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

detailed_translations.english: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.english: a four-star general
sentences.chinese: 四星上将

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things
an officer of very high rank in the army or air force

sentences.english: the Israeli-Egyptian peace process
sentences.chinese: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.english: Recycling is an industrial process.
sentences.chinese: 回收利用是一个工业流程。

sentences.english: All university applications are processed through this system.
sentences.chinese: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过程，进程；；工序；工艺流程
detailed_translations.english: a series of actions that are done in order to achieve a particular result
to deal with an official document, request etc in the usual way

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.english: We didn't leave early enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
to the necessary degree

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

sentences.english: We’ve spent a lot on the children’s education.
sentences.chinese: 我们在孩子的教育上花费甚多。

sentences.english: ‘How many CDs have you got?’ ‘Lots.’
sentences.chinese: “你有多少张CD？”“多着呢。”

sentences.english: They drew lots for the right to go first.
sentences.chinese: 他们拈阄儿决定谁先走。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount or number
to choose sb/sth by lot

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

sentences.english: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular holiday resort
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.english: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.chinese: 争取民主的全民运动

detailed_translations.english: liked by a lot of people

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
sentences.chinese: 一小片纸

sentences.english: a small car
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车

sentences.english: a small town
sentences.chinese: 小镇

sentences.english: a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.english: The T-shirt was too small for him.
sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.english: The sweater comes in three sizes - small, medium and large.
sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: Only a relatively small number of people were affected.
sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
sentences.chinese: 一小笔钱

sentences.english: A much smaller proportion of women are employed in senior positions.
sentences.chinese: 受雇担任高级职位的女性比例要小得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

sentences.english: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.english: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.english: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.english: I’m looking for a new job.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.english: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.
sentences.chinese: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

sentences.english: Sam does odd jobs(= small jobs in the house or garden ) for friends and neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

detailed_translations.english: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: I left my music at home.
sentences.chinese: 我把乐谱落在家里了。

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

sentences.english: He was a very nice person, always pleasant and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很好的人，始终彬彬有礼。

sentences.english: The only person who really said anything helpful was Jack.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个人真正说了些有用的话，就是杰克。

sentences.english: I like her as a person , but not as a boss.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢她这个人，但作为老板我就不喜欢了。

sentences.english: I still know quite a lot of people in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然认识村里的很多人。

sentences.english: a group of young people
sentences.chinese: 一群年轻人

sentences.english: You have to sign for it in person.
sentences.chinese: 你必须亲自签收。

detailed_translations.english: a human being, especially considered as someone with their own particular character

sentences.english: Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.english: Oliver’s not really her brother.
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.english: I never know what he’s really thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.english: She seems unfriendly at first, but she’s really very nice.
sentences.chinese: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真正地， 实际上； 很， 十分， 全然
detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: I haven’t had a chance to thank him yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没有机会向他表示谢意。

sentences.english: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

sentences.english: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are pleased and grateful for something they have done, or to be polite about it
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something

sentences.english: I’ve just started reading a book by Graham Greene.
sentences.chinese: 我刚开始看格雷厄姆·格林写的一本书。

sentences.english: a cookery book
sentences.chinese: 烹饪书

sentences.english: Have you booked a holiday this year?
sentences.chinese: 你今年有没有预订去度假？

detailed_translations.english: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them
to make arrangements to stay in a place, eat in a restaurant, go to a theatre etc at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

sentences.english: the early morning sunshine
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光

detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

sentences.english: He wore spectacles perched on the very end of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.english: The end of the pencil snapped.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔的笔尖啪的一声断了。

sentences.english: Jo joined the end of the line.
sentences.chinese: 乔排到了队尾。

sentences.english: She’ll do anything to achieve her own ends.
sentences.chinese: 她为了实现自己的目标，什么都会去做。

sentences.english: The road ends here.
sentences.chinese: 这条路到此为止。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a place or object that is furthest from its beginning or centre
to finish; to make sth finish

sentences.english: traditional teaching methods
sentences.chinese: 传统的教学法

sentences.english: I think we should try again using a different method.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们应该用不同的方法再试一次。

sentences.english: effective methods for the storage and retrieval of information
sentences.chinese: 信息存储和检索的有效方法

detailed_translations.english: a planned way of doing something, especially one that a lot of people know about and use

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: Doctors recommend eating less salt.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议少吃盐。

sentences.english: Maybe he would worry less if he understood the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他要是了解情况，也许就不会那么担心了。

sentences.english: In recent years she has appeared in public less frequently.
sentences.chinese: 近年来她在公开场合露面的次数少了。

detailed_translations.english: a smaller amount or not as much
not so much or to a smaller degree

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to be able to speak Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想学会讲日语。

sentences.english: one of my more able students
sentences.chinese: 我班上能力比较强的学生之一

detailed_translations.english: to have the skill, strength, knowledge etc needed to do something

sentences.english: The research involves collecting data from two random samples.
sentences.chinese: 该项研究需要从两个随机样本里收集资料。

detailed_translations.english: information or facts
information or facts

sentences.english: I am feeling very depressed.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Suddenly I felt a sharp pain in my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我突然感到肩部一阵剧痛。

sentences.english: I felt as if all my strength had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好象自己的力气已经全没了。

sentences.english: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉我好像每天都在经受挫折。

detailed_translations.english: If you feel a particular emotion or physical sensation, you experience it
to give you a particular physical feeling, especially when you touch or hold something

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.english: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.english: He kicked the ball high into the air, over the heads of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

sentences.english: He got into his car and drove off.
sentences.chinese: 他上了车，随即开车走了。

sentences.english: Will someone switch the radio off?
sentences.chinese: 谁把收音机关掉好吗？

detailed_translations.english: away from a place

sentences.english: The party's share of the vote fell by ten percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 该党的得票率下跌了十个百分点。

sentences.english: Here are the main points of the news.
sentences.chinese: 以下是新闻摘要。

sentences.english: There are three important points we must bear in mind.
sentences.chinese: 有三个要点我们必须记住。

sentences.english: He is three points behind the leader.
sentences.chinese: 他落后领先者三分。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or unit on a scale of measurement

sentences.english: I’ve already seen a few movies of this type.
sentences.chinese: 我已经看过几部这种类型的影片了。

sentences.english: He types with two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用两个手指打字。

detailed_translations.english: one member of a group of people or things that have similar features or qualities
to write something using a computer or a typewriter

sentences.english: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.english: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place ’

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

sentences.english: I felt certain that I’d passed the test.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己肯定通过这次测验了。

sentences.english: Many people look certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 许多人看来肯定要失业了。

detailed_translations.english: confident and sure, without any doubts

sentences.english: a successful economy
sentences.chinese: 发展成功的经济

sentences.english: the slowdown in the Japanese economy
sentences.chinese: 日本经济的减缓

sentences.english: The gas fire was turned low for reasons of economy.
sentences.chinese: 为了节省，把煤气取暖器开小了。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which a country’s money and goods are produced and used, or a country considered in this way

sentences.english: a little house
sentences.chinese: 小屋

sentences.english: a cake decorated with little flowers
sentences.chinese: 点缀着小花的蛋糕

sentences.english: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.
sentences.chinese: 她把肉切成小丁。

sentences.english: Let me tell you a little bit about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我来给你稍微讲讲我自己吧。

sentences.english: We didn’t have toys like this when I was little.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们没有这样的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: small in size

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

sentences.english: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.english: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

detailed_translations.english: during the night of this day
the night of this day

sentences.english: Elected officials ought to obey the law.
sentences.chinese: 民选官员理应遵守法律。

sentences.english: laws passed by Parliament
sentences.chinese: 议会通过的法律

detailed_translations.english: the whole system of rules that people in a particular country or area must obey

sentences.english: He put the coffee on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

sentences.english: Where did you put the programmes?
sentences.chinese: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

detailed_translations.english: to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

detailed_translations.english: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
Under is also an adverb

sentences.english: The alterations doubled the value of the house.
sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.english: We decided to get the house valued.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that something is worth
to decide how much money something is worth, by comparing it with similar things

sentences.english: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.english: I’ll always remember that day.
sentences.chinese: 我会永远记住那一天。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

sentences.english: the human body
sentences.chinese: 人体

sentences.english: My fingers were numb and my whole body ached.
sentences.chinese: 我手指麻木，浑身疼痛。

sentences.english: He needs to overcome a negative body image (=  what you think about your own body  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他需要克服对自己身体的负面印象。

sentences.english: A dog found the body of a girl in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 一条狗在树林里发现了一具女孩的尸体。

sentences.english: the main body of the text
sentences.chinese: 课文的正文

detailed_translations.english: the physical structure of a person or animal

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.english: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.chinese: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

detailed_translations.english: happening often and to many people or in many places

sentences.english: I usually buy all my vegetables at the market.
sentences.chinese: 我通常都是在菜市场里购买蔬菜。

sentences.english: Our main overseas market is Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要海外市场是日本。

detailed_translations.english: a time when people buy and sell goods, food etc, or the place, usually outside or in a large building, where this happens

sentences.english: The set (x, y) has two members.
sentences.chinese: （x, y）这个集里有两个项。

detailed_translations.english: a group of numbers, shapes etc in mathematics

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

sentences.english: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有茶水和饼干供应。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

sentences.english: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.chinese: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.english: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.english: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.chinese: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

detailed_translations.english: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words

sentences.english: The next six months will be the hardest.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的六个月将是最难熬的。

sentences.english: The man in the next chair was asleep.
sentences.chinese: 邻座的男子睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: coming straight after sb/sth in time, order or space

sentences.english: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.english: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.english: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.chinese: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

sentences.english: Completing the race is not just a simple matter of physical fitness.
sentences.chinese: 跑完比赛不仅仅是纯粹的体力问题。

sentences.english: I’m afraid Luke’s a bit simple.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得卢克有点笨。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that only one thing is involved

sentences.english: She loaded the new software .
sentences.chinese: 她给电脑装上新的软件。

sentences.english: a software company
sentences.chinese: 软件公司

detailed_translations.english: the sets of programs that tell a computer how to do a particular job

sentences.english: She was in an extremely confused state of mind .
sentences.chinese: 她思绪纷乱。

sentences.english: She can’t go home now. Look at the state of her!
sentences.chinese: 她现在不能回家。看看她这副样子！

sentences.english: The country was in a state of war (= officially fighting a war ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个国家正处于战争状态。

sentences.english: Water exists in three states: liquid, gaseous, and solid.
sentences.chinese: 水有三种形态: 液态、气态和固态。

sentences.english: ...reform of the state social-security system.
sentences.chinese: …国家社会保障体制的改革。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental condition that someone or something is in
to formally say or write a piece of information or your opinion
State industries or organizations are financed and organized by the government rather than private companies

sentences.english: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.english: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.english: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
detailed_translations.english: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

sentences.english: Police had to be called in to control the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.english: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.english: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

sentences.english: He did not have much knowledge of American history.
sentences.chinese: 他对美国历史所知不多。

sentences.english: Evans denied all knowledge of the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯说他对这次抢劫一无所知。

detailed_translations.english: the information, skills, and understanding that you have gained through learning or experience

sentences.english: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.english: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.english: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or right to control people or events

sentences.english: We’ve lost radio contact with the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们和这架飞机失去了无线电联络。

sentences.english: I sat down and turned on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来打开收音机。

detailed_translations.english: when messages are sent or received in this way

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

sentences.english: a hard wooden chair
sentences.chinese: 一把硬木椅

sentences.english: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.chinese: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.english: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.chinese: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

sentences.english: This year’s exam was much harder than last year’s.
sentences.chinese: 今年的考试比去年的难得多。

detailed_translations.english: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

sentences.english: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.chinese: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

detailed_translations.english: to put something with something else or with a group of other things

sentences.english: Which company do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪家公司上班？

sentences.english: I called the phone company about the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我就电话账单的事给电话公司打了电话。

sentences.english: The company was set up just after the war.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是战后不久成立的。

sentences.english: People judge you by the company you keep (= the people you spend time with ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们根据你交往的朋友来判断你的为人。

detailed_translations.english: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.english: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend

sentences.english: Judging by her past performance, Jane should do very well.
sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.english: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

sentences.english: The price of fuel keeps going up.
sentences.chinese: 燃料价格持续上涨。

sentences.english: They may pay a high price for their few years of glory.
sentences.chinese: 为了短短几年的辉煌，他们也许要付出高昂的代价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money you have to pay for something

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

sentences.english: Go away!
sentences.chinese: 走开！

sentences.english: Dinah was crying as she drove slowly away.
sentences.chinese: 黛娜一边哭一边慢慢地开车走了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone leaves a place or person, or stays some distance from a place or person

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount
The Internet is the network that allows computer users to connect with computers all over the world, and that carries e-mail

sentences.english: Is it possible to get tickets for the game?
sentences.chinese: 有没有可能弄到比赛的门票？

sentences.english: It might be possible for the documents to be sent over.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件也许可以发送过去。

sentences.english: Computer technology makes it possible for many people to work from home.
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术让很多人可以在家里工作。

sentences.english: I want to avoid the rush hour traffic if possible .
sentences.chinese: 如有可能我想避开交通高峰时间。

sentences.english: I walk or use public transport whenever possible .
sentences.chinese: 只要有可能我就步行或者乘坐公共交通工具。

sentences.english: We are doing everything possible to track down the killer.
sentences.chinese: 我们正竭尽全力追捕杀人凶手。

sentences.english: Our staff will help you in every way possible .
sentences.chinese: 我们的员工会尽力帮助你。

sentences.english: Even if it were technically possible , we do not have the money to do it.
sentences.chinese: 即使技术上可行，我们也没有钱去做。

sentences.english: She decided to stay as far away from him as was humanly possible .
sentences.chinese: 她决定尽可能离他远点。

detailed_translations.english: if something is possible, it can be done or achieved

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

sentences.english: They’ve won their last three games.
sentences.chinese: 他们赢了最近三场比赛。

sentences.english: We’d better go. It’s almost three (= three o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们该走了。快3点了。

sentences.english: My little sister’s only three (= three years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹只有3岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 3
the number 3

sentences.english: She doesn’t understand English.
sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to know the meaning of what someone is telling you, or the language that they speak

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

sentences.english: Make a list of all the things you have to do.
sentences.chinese: 把你必须做的所有事情列一个清单。

sentences.english: The first person on my list is Mrs Gilling.
sentences.chinese: 我的名单上排在第一位的是吉林夫人。

sentences.english: The guidebook lists 1,000 hotels and restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 旅游手册上列有1,000家宾馆和餐厅。

detailed_translations.english: a set of names, numbers etc, usually written one below the other, for example so that you can remember or check them
to write a list, or mention things one after the other

sentences.english: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.chinese: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.english: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.english: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.chinese: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.english: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

detailed_translations.english: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

sentences.english: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.english: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.english: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.chinese: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别的，特指的；讲究的；挑剔的，吹毛求疵的
detailed_translations.english: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other

sentences.english: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

detailed_translations.english: something that is real is actually what it seems to be and not false or artificial

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 这条街两边都可停车。

detailed_translations.english: one or the other of two; it does not matter which

sentences.english: a public library
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆

sentences.english: a library book
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书

sentences.english: My thanks go to the British School of Osteopathy, for the use of their library.
sentences.chinese: 感谢不列颠骨疗法学校允许我使用他们的藏书。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

sentences.english: Snow showers are likely tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天可能有阵雪。

sentences.english: the most likely cause of the problem
sentences.chinese: 造成这个问题最有可能的原因

sentences.english: It is more than likely (= almost certain ) the votes will have to be counted again.
sentences.chinese: 选票很有可能要重新点算。

sentences.english: It could have been an accident, but that was hardly likely (= not very likely ).
sentences.chinese: 这有可能是意外事故，但可能性不大。

sentences.english: I’d very likely have done the same thing in your situation.
sentences.chinese: 我要是处在你这种情况，也很有可能会那样做的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is likely will probably happen or is probably true
probably

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.english: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.english: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

sentences.english: First of all, we need to know the facts of the case.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们需要了解案子的相关事实。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of information that is known to be true

sentences.english: Draw a straight line across the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在这一页的上方画一条直线。

sentences.english: Sign your name on the dotted line (= line made up of a series of dots ).
sentences.chinese: 在虚线上签名。

sentences.english: The edges of the pitch are marked by white lines.
sentences.chinese: 球场的四边画着白线。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to stop the ball going over the line.
sentences.chinese: 守门员刚好把球截住，没有让它越过球门线。

sentences.english: He raced towards the finishing line.
sentences.chinese: 他朝终点线冲刺。

sentences.english: The four men were standing in a line on the other side of the table.
sentences.chinese: 那四个男人在桌子的另一边站成一排。

sentences.english: Light travels in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 光沿直线传播。

sentences.english: A boat came into my line of vision (= direction I was looking in ).
sentences.chinese: 一艘船进入了我的视线。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin mark on a piece of paper, the ground, or another surface

sentences.english: The London factory assembles the finished product .
sentences.chinese: 伦敦工厂组装成品。

sentences.english: He works in marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 他从事营销和产品开发。

sentences.english: Paula was the product of a sheltered middle-class home.
sentences.chinese: 葆拉是备受呵护的中产阶级家庭的产物。

sentences.english: The product of 21 and 16 is 336.

detailed_translations.english: something that is grown or made in a factory in large quantities, usually in order to be sold

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

sentences.english: He was surrounded by a group of admirers.

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

sentences.english: a book of short stories
sentences.chinese: 短篇小说集

sentences.english: We cuddled together over a bedtime story .
sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.english: The film was based on a true story .
sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened – it’s only a story (= it is imaginary ) .
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，这只是一个故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话
detailed_translations.english: a description of how something happened, that is intended to entertain people, and may be true or imaginary
to decorate (a pot, wall, etc) with scenes from history or legends

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

detailed_translations.english: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service

sentences.english: I didn’t read the last chapter of the book.
sentences.chinese: 我没有看这本书的最后一章。

sentences.english: Add the flour last.
sentences.chinese: 最后加面粉。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing at the end, with no others after
after everything or everyone else

sentences.english: The scandal was widely reported in the national media .
sentences.chinese: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.english: The role of the news media in forming public opinion is very important.
sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.english: The 11-day trial generated intense media interest .
sentences.chinese: 11天的审讯引起了媒体的高度关注。

sentences.english: A great deal of media hype surrounded the release of the group’s latest CD.
sentences.chinese: 媒体对这个组合最新唱片的发行进行了大肆炒作。

sentences.english: There will be another war somewhere else and the whole international media circus will move on.
sentences.chinese: 别的地方还会有战争，全球的媒体又会一窝蜂地拥过去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新闻媒介， 传播媒介
detailed_translations.english: all the organizations, such as television, radio, and newspapers, that provide news and information for the public, or the people who do this work

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.chinese: 他没有再靠近。

detailed_translations.english: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
when someone moves for a short time in a particular direction

sentences.english: How would you like to pay?
sentences.chinese: 你想怎么付款？

detailed_translations.english: to give someone money for something you buy or for a service

sentences.english: the sport of falconry
sentences.chinese: 放鹰狩猎运动

sentences.english: a demonstration by people opposed to blood sports
sentences.chinese: 反对猎杀动物运动的人士举行的示威游行

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑
detailed_translations.english: an activity that people do in the countryside, especially hunting or fishing
to play together happily

sentences.english: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.chinese: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.english: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.english: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.english: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.english: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.chinese: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.english: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.chinese: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.english: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.chinese: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.english: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.english: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.chinese: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens

sentences.english: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.english: sailing against the wind
sentences.chinese: 逆风航行

detailed_translations.english: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

sentences.english: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.english: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到远处的群山。

sentences.english: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.chinese: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

detailed_translations.english: a long distance away
a long distance

sentences.english: There’s plenty of fun for all the family.
sentences.chinese: 可以让全家人玩得很开心。

sentences.english: The children were having so much fun, I hated to call them inside.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子玩得很开心，我不忍心把他们叫进来。

detailed_translations.english: an experience or activity that is very enjoyable and exciting

sentences.english: a four-bedroom house
sentences.chinese: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.english: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.chinese: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.english: a small independent software house
sentences.chinese: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.english: an auction house
sentences.chinese: 一家拍卖行

sentences.english: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.chinese: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

sentences.english: I can’t come out tonight – my dad won’t let me.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我不能出来，我爸爸不允许。

detailed_translations.english: to allow someone to do something

sentences.english: The full address is given on page 15.
sentences.chinese: 详细地址见第15页。

sentences.english: You will find the answers over the page .
sentences.chinese: 答案见下页。

sentences.english: a 400﹣page novel
sentences.chinese: 一本400页的小说

sentences.english: We took out a full page advertisement in the ‘Village Voice’.
sentences.chinese: 我们在《村声》上投放了一整版广告。

detailed_translations.english: one side of a piece of paper in a book, newspaper, document etc, or the sheet of paper itself

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

sentences.english: Did you get a good mark in the test?
sentences.chinese: 你这次测验成绩好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge
to examine a substance or thing in order to find out its qualities or what it contains

sentences.english: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.english: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.english: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.english: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

detailed_translations.english: before a certain period of time has passed
Within is also an adverb

sentences.english: We were driving along Follyfoot Road.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着福莱福特路行驶。

sentences.english: She glanced anxiously along the line of faces.
sentences.chinese: 她焦急地扫视着这一排面孔。

sentences.english: He slid his hand along her arm.
sentences.chinese: 他的手顺着她的臂膀滑下。

sentences.english: I was driving along, thinking about Chris.
sentences.chinese: 我一边开车，一边想着克里斯。

detailed_translations.english: from one place on something such as a line, road, or edge towards the other end of it
going forward

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

sentences.english: The population increased dramatically in the first half of the century.
sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.english: political tensions that might increase the likelihood of war
sentences.chinese: 或许会增加战争爆发可能性的紧张政治局面

sentences.english: Visits to the site have increased threefold since May.
sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.english: an increase in spending
sentences.chinese: 开支的增长

detailed_translations.english: to become or to make sth greater in amount, number, value, etc.
a rise in the amount, number or value of sth

sentences.english: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees C.
sentences.chinese: 把烤箱预热至200摄氏度。

sentences.english: Press the mixture onto the bread and bake in a hot oven for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把混合料抹在面包上，然后在烤箱内高温烘烤10分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that food is cooked inside, shaped like a metal box with a door on the front

sentences.english: I’m sorry. That’s quite impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，那是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: I felt quite bitter about it at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我对此感到相当痛苦。

sentences.english: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.chinese: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.english: I can see it quite clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我能清清楚楚地看见它。

detailed_translations.english: completely

sentences.english: A single tree gave shade from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一棵树遮阴。

sentences.english: They won the game by a single point.
sentences.chinese: 他们仅以一分的优势赢得比赛。

sentences.english: the highest price ever paid for a single work of art
sentences.chinese: 为单件艺术品所支付的最高价格

sentences.english: a single-sex school
sentences.chinese: 单一性别的学校

detailed_translations.english: only one
a ticket for a trip from one place to another but not back again

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.chinese: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.english: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

detailed_translations.english: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

sentences.english: The new arts centre will serve the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.english: the Polish community in London
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

sentences.english: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.english: Does it matter what I think?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.english: Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.english: campaigning on issues that really matter
sentences.chinese: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.english: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.english: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.english: At last she was with the man she loved and nothing else mattered .
sentences.chinese: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.english: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.chinese: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens

sentences.english: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.chinese: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.english: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.chinese: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.english: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.chinese: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

sentences.english: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

detailed_translations.english: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

sentences.english: She moistenend  the soil round the plant.
sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

detailed_translations.english: to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body
to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.chinese: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.english: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.chinese: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

sentences.english: People say the judge had been bought by the Mafia.
sentences.chinese: 人们都说法官被黑手党收买了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest
to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest

sentences.english: The Sergeant told Swift to guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.english: a lioness guarding her cubs
sentences.chinese: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.english: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person, place, or object by staying near them and watching them
someone whose job is to protect a place or person

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

sentences.english: How many languages do you speak?
sentences.chinese: 你能说几种语言？

sentences.english: one of the best-known poems in the English language
sentences.chinese: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

sentences.chinese: 居住在西班牙的主要原因是天气。

sentences.english: Our main concern is that the children are safe.

sentences.english: I’ll meet you outside the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我在大门外等你。

sentences.english: the main bedroom

detailed_translations.english: larger or more important than all other things, ideas etc of the same kind

sentences.english: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！
