sentences.chinese: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine

sentences.english: Congratulations on the birth of your daughter!
sentences.chinese: 恭喜你生了个女儿！

sentences.english: He only weighed 2 kilos at birth.
sentences.chinese: 他出生时体重只有两公斤。

sentences.english: Henry has been blind from birth.
sentences.chinese: 亨利先天失明。

sentences.english: What’s your date of birth ?
sentences.chinese: 你的出生日期是哪一天？

sentences.english: The exact place of birth is not recorded.
sentences.chinese: 确切的出生地没有记录。

sentences.english: They believe that the position of the planets at the time of birth determines the fate of the individual.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信，出生时的星象决定了一个人的命运。

sentences.english: More and more women are choosing to have home births.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的女性选择在家分娩。

sentences.english: Smoking in pregnancy has been linked to premature birth.
sentences.chinese: 孕期吸烟已被认为与早产有关联。

sentences.english: the association between birth weight and blood pressure
sentences.chinese: 出生体重和血压的关系

sentences.english: The drug was found to cause serious birth defects.
sentences.chinese: 这种药被发现可造成严重的先天缺陷。

sentences.english: a woman of noble birth
sentences.chinese: 一位出身于贵族的女子

detailed_translations.english: the time when a baby comes out of its mother’s body

sentences.english: Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
sentences.chinese: 丹下了车，锁上车门。

sentences.english: He isn’t old enough to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他还未到可以开车的年龄。

sentences.english: Coughlan was killed in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 科赫兰死于一场车祸。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers

sentences.english: I offered to pay the cost of the taxi.
sentences.chinese: 我提出支付出租车费。

sentences.english: Insurance to cover the cost of a funeral is possible.
sentences.chinese: 可以用保险支付葬礼费用。

sentences.english: This doesn’t include the cost of repairing the damage.
sentences.chinese: 这不包括修理破损的费用。

sentences.english: the terrible cost of the war in death and suffering
sentences.chinese: 这场战争造成的死亡与苦难的惨重代价

sentences.english: low cost housing
sentences.chinese: 低成本住宅

sentences.english: the high cost of production
sentences.chinese: 很高的生产成本

sentences.english: A cassette/radio is included at no extra cost .
sentences.chinese: 附送一台卡式收录机。

sentences.english: The funds will just cover the museum’s running costs .
sentences.chinese: 这些资金只够支付博物馆的运转费用。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you have to pay in order to buy, do, or produce something

sentences.english: the personnel department
sentences.chinese: 人事部

sentences.english: the English department
sentences.chinese: 英语系

detailed_translations.english: one of the groups of people who work together in a particular part of a large organization such as a hospital, university, company, or government

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

sentences.english: I could hear a dog barking .
sentences.chinese: 我听到了狗吠声。

sentences.english: He’s taken the dog for a walk .
sentences.chinese: 他去遛狗了。

sentences.english: We used to have a dog when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候我们养过狗。

sentences.english: the most popular breed of dog
sentences.chinese: 最受人喜欢的犬种

detailed_translations.english: a common animal with four legs, fur, and a tail. Dogs are kept as pets or trained to guard places, find drugs etc.

sentences.english: Can you drive?
sentences.chinese: 你会开车吗？

sentences.english: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.english: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

detailed_translations.english: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

sentences.english: beautiful green eyes
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的碧眼

sentences.english: Raw coffee beans are green in colour.
sentences.chinese: 生咖啡豆是绿色的。

sentences.english: a room decorated in pale blues and greens
sentences.chinese: 用浅蓝色和浅绿色装修的房间

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of grass or leaves
the colour of grass and leaves

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

sentences.english: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

sentences.english: a late evening news broadcast
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻节目

sentences.english: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

detailed_translations.english: reports of recent events in the newspapers or on the radio or television

sentences.english: If no one objects, I would like Mrs Harrison to be present.
sentences.chinese: 如果没人反对的话，我想请哈里森夫人出席。

detailed_translations.english: to feel or say that you oppose or disapprove of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 实物， 物体； 目的， 目标； 对象， 客体； 宾语
detailed_translations.english: a solid thing that you can hold, touch, or see but that is not alive

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you agree with an idea, group, or person, and usually to help them because you want them to succeed

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

sentences.english: Most of the evidence was destroyed in the fire. Thus it would be almost impossible to prove him guilty.
sentences.chinese: 大多数证据已在大火中烧毁，因而要证明他有罪几乎是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

sentences.english: We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

sentences.english: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

detailed_translations.english: to get pleasure from something

sentences.english: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.english: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

sentences.english: The sash, kimono, and other garments were made to fit a child.
sentences.chinese: 这些腰带、和服和其他衣服都做得适合孩子穿。

detailed_translations.english: to put a piece of equipment into a place, or a new part onto a machine, so that it is ready to be used
if something fits another thing, it is similar to it or suitable for it

sentences.english: We’re so glad you came.
sentences.chinese: 你来了我们真高兴。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve decided to accept the job.’ ‘I’m glad.’
sentences.chinese: “我决定接受这份工作。”“我很高兴。”

sentences.english: I’d be glad if you’d let me know when the funeral is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能告诉我葬礼的时间，我将非常感激。

detailed_translations.english: pleased and happy about something

sentences.english: low-income families
sentences.chinese: 低收入家庭

detailed_translations.english: the money that you earn from your work or that you receive from investments, the government etc

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

sentences.english: Chenier and the band are performing at the Silver Palace tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.english: The children perform two plays each school year.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们一学年表演两部话剧。

sentences.english: She was fired for not performing the duties outlined in her contract.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有履行合同中规定的职责，她被解雇了。

detailed_translations.english: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music

sentences.english: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.english: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.chinese: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.english: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.chinese: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

detailed_translations.english: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to get money from doing something

sentences.english: It is right and proper that parents take responsibility for their children's attendance at school.
sentences.chinese: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.english: He is always perfectly proper in his behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为举止向来是无可挑剔的。

detailed_translations.english: socially and morally acceptable

sentences.english: a cleaner that will remove wine stains
sentences.chinese: 可去除葡萄酒酒渍的清洁剂

sentences.english: The college removed rules that prevented women from enrolling.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学取消了禁止女性入学的规定。

detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

sentences.english: It was forty five minutes before she returned.
sentences.chinese: 过了45分钟她才回来。

sentences.english: Alison decided to return home.
sentences.chinese: 艾利森决定回家。

sentences.english: He left his country, never to return.
sentences.chinese: 他离开了祖国，一去不复返。

detailed_translations.english: to go or come back to a place where you were before
the act of returning from somewhere, or your arrival back in a place
used or paid for a journey from one place to another and back again

sentences.english: For a while, she ran a restaurant in Boston.
sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.english: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.english: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.english: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

sentences.english: a state-run (= controlled by the government ) television station
sentences.chinese: 国营电视台

detailed_translations.english: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country

detailed_translations.chinese: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
detailed_translations.english: to be very busy and continuously rushing about

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: He was a big strong man.
sentences.chinese: 他高大健壮。

sentences.english: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.english: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.chinese: 和他打我还不够强壮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy things, do hard physical work etc

sentences.english: an attempt to use Japanese management style in a European business
sentences.chinese: 将日本的管理方式用于欧洲企业的尝试

detailed_translations.english: a particular way of doing, designing, or producing something, especially one that is typical of a particular place, period of time, or group of people
to design clothing, furniture, or the shape of someone’s hair in a particular way

sentences.english: the Vietnam War
sentences.chinese: 越南战争

sentences.english: He served as a pilot during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战时担任飞行员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争
detailed_translations.english: when there is fighting between two or more countries or between opposing groups within a country, involving large numbers of soldiers and weapons

sentences.english: I’m not joking. Those were his actual words.
sentences.chinese: 我没开玩笑，那都是他的原话。

sentences.english: I know Germany won, but I can’t tell you the actual score.
sentences.chinese: 我知道德国队胜了，但我不知道确切的比分。

sentences.english: Interest is only charged on the actual amount borrowed.
sentences.chinese: 利息只按实际借款额收取。

sentences.english: In actual fact (= really  ) , there is little evidence to support the allegations.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这些指控几乎没有证据支持。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is real or exact

sentences.english: The timing of the announcement was particularly appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.english: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

sentences.english: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.english: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.chinese: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

detailed_translations.english: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose
to take something, especially money, to use for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Did you bank that check?
sentences.chinese: 你把那张支票存入银行了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to put or keep money in a bank

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应
detailed_translations.english: a group of buildings, or a large building with many parts, used for a particular purpose

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

sentences.english: traditional rural crafts
sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.english: arts and crafts
sentences.chinese: 手工艺

detailed_translations.english: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do
to make something using a special skill, especially with your hands

sentences.english: The team are due to fly to Italy next month.
sentences.chinese: 该球队预定下个月飞往意大利。

sentences.english: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.chinese: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

detailed_translations.english: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

sentences.english: Successful people often aren’t very good at dealing with failure.
sentences.chinese: 一帆风顺的人往往不太擅长应对失败。

sentences.english: I always felt a bit of a failure at school.
sentences.chinese: 我上学时总觉得自己有点失败。

detailed_translations.english: a lack of success in achieving or doing something

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.english: He concealed the key inside his tie.
sentences.chinese: 他把钥匙藏在领带里面。

sentences.english: The door had been locked from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 门从里面锁上了。

detailed_translations.english: in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part

sentences.english: What’s the meaning of this? I asked you to be here an hour ago!
sentences.chinese: 这是什么意思？我让你一小时之前就要到的！

detailed_translations.english: the thing or idea that a word, expression, or sign represents

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

sentences.english: We rowed out towards the middle of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们朝湖中央划去。

sentences.english: They spent the middle part of their vacation in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：假期的中间一段他们是在佛罗里达州度过的。

detailed_translations.english: the part that is nearest the centre of something, and furthest from the sides, edges, top, bottom etc
half of the way through an event or period of time

sentences.english: Emma studies philosophy at university.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

detailed_translations.english: the study of the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil, etc

sentences.english: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

sentences.english: Students have to reach a certain standard or they won’t pass.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须达到某一标准，否则无法通过。

sentences.english: The airline has rigorous safety standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家航空公司有严格的安全标准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准；水准；旗；度量衡标准
detailed_translations.english: the level that is considered to be acceptable, or the level that someone or something has achieved

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准的；合规格的；公认为优秀的
detailed_translations.english: accepted as normal or usual

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

sentences.english: Has anything been decided yet?
sentences.chinese: 已经作出什么决定了吗？

sentences.english: The trainees decide among themselves what programs to take.
sentences.chinese: 受训者自行选择课程。

sentences.english: After a long discussion, they decided in favour of (= chose ) the older applicant.
sentences.chinese: 经过长时间的讨论，他们决定选那位较年长的求职者。

detailed_translations.english: to make a choice or judgment about something, especially after considering all the possibilities or arguments

sentences.english: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.english: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.english: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something and receive the same kind of thing from them at the same time
the act of giving someone something and receiving something else from them

sentences.english: He’s got beautiful eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

sentences.english: There were tears in her eyes as she listened to the story.
sentences.chinese: 她听故事时眼里噙着泪水。

sentences.english: A surgeon needs a good eye and a steady hand.
sentences.chinese: 做外科医生眼要准，手要稳。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

sentences.english: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
sentences.chinese: 他离得太远，没法看面孔认出谁是谁。

sentences.english: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
sentences.chinese: 警方采集了指纹，对尸体作了身份确认。

detailed_translations.english: to recognize and correctly name someone or something

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

sentences.english: My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.english: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.chinese: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。

sentences.english: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.
sentences.chinese: 请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.english: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.chinese: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。

detailed_translations.english: to go away from a place or a person
to go away from a place or a person

sentences.english: The land was returned to its original owner.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.english: The kitchen still has many original features (= parts that were there when the house was first built ).
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房仍保留着当初的许多特点。

sentences.english: the original meaning of the word
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的原意

sentences.english: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
sentences.chinese: 原先的计划是飞往纽约。

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening first, before other people or things

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone is standing, sitting, or lying

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

sentences.english: We reached London late at night.
sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.english: She reached into her bag and produced a business card.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.english: Chelsea could reach the final of the European Cup.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西队会进入欧洲杯决赛。

detailed_translations.english: to arrive at a place

sentences.english: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于
detailed_translations.english: to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax

detailed_translations.chinese: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

sentences.english: There was only one girl serving customers .
sentences.chinese: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用
detailed_translations.english: to help the customers in a shop, especially by bringing them the things that they want
the action in a game such as tennis or  volleyball  when you throw the ball in the air and hit it over the net

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.english: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.english: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.chinese: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.english: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

sentences.english: the jury box
sentences.chinese: 陪审团席

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

sentences.english: Students must complete the course.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

sentences.english: The building took two years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼花了两年时间才完工。

sentences.english: The darkness was almost complete.
sentences.chinese: 几乎是漆黑一片。

sentences.english: a complete stranger
sentences.chinese: 一个完全陌生的人

detailed_translations.english: to finish doing or making something, especially when it has taken a long time
used to emphasize that a quality or situation is as great as it could possibly be

sentences.english: He will be continuing his education in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他将在美国继续求学。

sentences.english: 英文例句: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.english: 英文例句:The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

detailed_translations.english: to not stop happening, existing, or doing something

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

sentences.english: Silva issued a statement denying all knowledge of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 西尔瓦发表声明，宣称对此事一无所知。

sentences.english: a warning issued by the Surgeon General
sentences.chinese: （美国）卫生局局长发出的警告

detailed_translations.chinese: 发行； 分发， 发出
detailed_translations.english: to officially make a statement, give an order, warning etc
a subject or problem that is often discussed or argued about, especially a social or political matter that affects the interests of a lot of people

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

sentences.english: Are we doing enough to protect the environment?
sentences.chinese: 我们在保护环境方面做得够吗？

detailed_translations.english: to keep someone or something safe from harm, damage, or illness

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.english: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

detailed_translations.english: to need something

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

sentences.english: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.chinese: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

sentences.english: games for active youngsters
sentences.chinese: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.english: She’s over 80, but is still very active.
sentences.chinese: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

sentences.english: He became politically active at college.
sentences.chinese: 他上大学时开始积极参与政治活动。

detailed_translations.english: always busy doing things, especially physical or mental activities

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

sentences.english: inorganic/organic chemistry
sentences.chinese: 无机 / 有机化学

detailed_translations.english: the science that is concerned with studying the structure of substances and the way that they change or combine with each other

sentences.english: a woman’s menstrual cycle
sentences.chinese: 女性的月经周期

detailed_translations.chinese: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
detailed_translations.english: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: Where do those kids get their energy from?
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

sentences.english: She had a beautiful face.
sentences.chinese: 她面容秀美。

sentences.english: Her face was white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 她吓得脸煞白。

sentences.english: A big smile spread across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上绽开了灿烂笑容。

sentences.english: I felt like punching him in the face.
sentences.chinese: 我真想给他脸上来一拳。

sentences.english: The birds build their nests in the rock face.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在岩壁上筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are

sentences.english: He opened the cardboard box and took out each item.
sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.english: The store is having a sale on furniture and household items.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.english: luxury items such as exotic spices and perfumes
sentences.chinese: 异国香料和香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

sentences.english: The gate is made of metal.
sentences.chinese: 这扇大门是用金属做成的。

sentences.english: a small black metal box
sentences.chinese: 一个黑色的金属小盒子

sentences.english: They traded in gold and other precious metals (= valuable metals used especially for making jewellery ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们做黄金和其他贵金属的交易。

sentences.english: The old trucks were sold as scrap metal (= old metal that is melted and used again ) .
sentences.chinese: 这些旧卡车被当作金属废料卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually shiny substance such as iron, gold, or steel

sentences.english: the President’s radio broadcast to the nation
sentences.chinese: 总统对全国的广播讲话

sentences.english: an independent nation
sentences.chinese: 独立的国家

sentences.english: the world’s leading industrial nations
sentences.chinese: 世界上的主要工业国

sentences.english: the Cherokee nation
sentences.chinese: 切罗基族

detailed_translations.english: a country, considered especially in relation to its people and its social or economic structure

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的

sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

detailed_translations.english: something that is straight does not bend or curve

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地
detailed_translations.english: in a level or correct position

detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

sentences.english: I walked a few steps toward the fence.
sentences.chinese: 我向栅栏走了几步。

detailed_translations.english: a journey that you make by walking, especially for exercise or enjoyment
When you walk, you move forward by putting one foot in front of the other in a regular way

sentences.english: young white males
sentences.chinese: 年轻的白种男性

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the race of people with pale skin

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

sentences.english: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.english: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.english: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.chinese: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard
if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

sentences.english: You shouldn’t believe everything you read.
sentences.chinese: 你不应尽信书上看来的东西。

sentences.english: I believed him, even though his story sounded unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 我相信了他，尽管他的话听上去难以置信。

sentences.english: I don’t believe a word of it (=  I think it is completely untrue  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我一句话也不相信。

sentences.english: Did you honestly believe that I’d be stupid enough to do that?
sentences.chinese: 你真的认为我会傻到做那样的事情吗？。

detailed_translations.english: to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth

sentences.english: They crossed the mountains and headed for the valleys beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻过山，向更远处的山谷进发。

sentences.english: Beyond the river, cattle were grazing.
sentences.chinese: 河的那边，牛在吃草。

sentences.english: She drove through Westport, and stopped a few miles beyond at a wayside inn.
sentences.chinese: 她驱车穿过西港，在几英里外的一个路边旅馆停了下来。

detailed_translations.english: on or to the further side of something

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

sentences.english: Do you ever wonder if you made the right decision?
sentences.chinese: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.english: The judges’ decision is final (= it will not be changed ).
sentences.chinese: 法官的裁决是最终判决。

sentences.english: the ability to act with speed and decision
sentences.chinese: 处事迅速果断的能力

detailed_translations.english: a choice or judgment that you make after a period of discussion or thought

sentences.english: Experienced users have direct access to the main data files.
sentences.chinese: 高级用户可直接浏览主数据文档。

sentences.english: I’m not in direct contact with them.
sentences.chinese: 我和他们没有直接的联系。

sentences.english: Few policy-makers have had direct experience of business.
sentences.chinese: 决策者几乎都没有直接的从商经历。

sentences.english: Women often feel men are too direct and not sympathetic enough.
sentences.chinese: 女人常常觉得男人太直率，不够体贴。

detailed_translations.english: done without any other people, actions, processes etc coming between

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

sentences.english: an excellent suggestion
sentences.chinese: 极好的建议

sentences.english: His car is in excellent condition.
sentences.chinese: 他的汽车状况极佳。

sentences.english: Second-hand computers can be excellent value.
sentences.chinese: 二手计算机买得好会非常合算。

detailed_translations.english: extremely good or of very high quality

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

sentences.english: She now lives with actor Denis Lawson, 10 years her junior.
sentences.chinese: 她现在和比她小10岁的演员丹尼斯·劳森同居。

detailed_translations.english: If you are someone's junior, you are younger than they are

sentences.english: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

sentences.english: The Roman Swiss Army knife has a knife, spoon, fork, spike, spatula, and small pick.
sentences.chinese: 这种古罗马瑞士军刀包含了刀，勺，叉，长钉，抹刀和小鹤嘴锄。

detailed_translations.english: a  pickaxe

sentences.english: Her family were so poor they couldn’t afford to buy her new clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.english: an area where poor people lived
sentences.chinese: 穷人居住区

sentences.english: one of the poorest countries in the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上最贫穷的国家之一

sentences.english: a poor part of Chicago (= where a lot of poor people live )
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥的一个贫民区

sentences.english: My grandparents grew up dirt poor (= very poor ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母在赤贫的环境里长大。

sentences.english: The country is poor in natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 该国自然资源匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: having very little money and not many possessions

sentences.english: pots and pans
sentences.chinese: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.english: a pot of jam
sentences.chinese: 一罐果酱

detailed_translations.english: a deep round container used for cooking things in

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

sentences.english: The hotel is not responsible for any loss or damage to guests’ personal property .
sentences.chinese: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.english: Some of the stolen property was found in Mason’s house.
sentences.chinese: 在梅森家里找到了部分被盗财物。

detailed_translations.english: the thing or things that someone owns

sentences.english: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.english: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

sentences.chinese: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.chinese: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

sentences.chinese: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university, school etc

sentences.english: The food was served on long tables.
sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs
to leave a bill etc to be discussed or dealt with in the future

sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

sentences.chinese: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

detailed_translations.english: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
detailed_translations.english: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

sentences.chinese: 利特曼拒绝公开讨论此案。

sentences.english: If you would like to discuss the matter further, please call me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请打电话给我。

sentences.english: This topic will be discussed in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 该主题将在第四章进行详述。

sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

sentences.chinese: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

sentences.chinese: 最后一集将于今晚播出。

sentences.english: students preparing for their final examinations
sentences.chinese: 正在准备期末考试的学生

sentences.chinese: 斯通正在拍摄越战三部曲的最后一部。

sentences.english: the final stages in their relationship

sentences.chinese: 他们在比赛的最后几分钟得分。

sentences.chinese: 我们可以提出建议，但是最终的决定权还是在客户自己手里。

sentences.chinese: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.english: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.english: the happy faces of the children
sentences.chinese: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.english: This has been the happiest day of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是我一生中最快乐的一天。

sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely

sentences.chinese: 铃响了一下苏菲就接起了电话。

sentences.english: He lifted the lid on the pot of soup.
sentences.chinese: 他揭开汤锅的盖子。

sentences.chinese: 木材由起重机搬运到卡车上。

sentences.chinese: 他们乘电梯去楼下的酒吧。

sentences.english: It’s on the 3rd floor. Let’s use the lift.
sentences.chinese: 在三楼，我们乘电梯上去吧。

sentences.english: Oil and water don’t mix.
sentences.chinese: 油和水不相融。

detailed_translations.english: if you mix two or more substances or if they mix, they combine to become a single substance, and they cannot be easily separated

sentences.english: Hungary’s telephone network
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利的电话网

sentences.english: a high-speed European rail network
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的高速铁路网

sentences.english: the network of blood vessels in the body
sentences.chinese: 人体内的血管网

detailed_translations.english: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.english: Did you go to the office (= the office where you work ) today?
sentences.chinese: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.english: the increased demand for office space
sentences.chinese: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

sentences.english: the Foreign Office
sentences.chinese: 外交部

detailed_translations.english: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks

sentences.english: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.english: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.english: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

sentences.english: President Bush
sentences.chinese: 布什总统

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人
detailed_translations.english: the official leader of a country that does not have a king or queen

sentences.english: Morris has a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.english: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.chinese: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

detailed_translations.english: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

sentences.chinese: 我们过了一段时间才意识到这场悲剧有多严重。

sentences.english: It was only later that I realized my mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我到后来才认识到自己的错误。

sentences.english: She never realized her ambition of winning an Olympic gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句:她一直未能实现赢取奥运会金牌的抱负。

sentences.english: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed

sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.chinese: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.chinese: 我们被阻止进入现场。

sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

young people

sentences.chinese: 他的目光一直盯着前面的那辆汽车。

sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

sentences.english: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

sentences.english: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.chinese: 我们走向最近的出口。

sentences.chinese: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

sentences.chinese: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

sentences.chinese: “你是谁？”他低声问道，预计她可能不会回答。

sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).

sentences.chinese: 他有两颗门牙被打落了。

sentences.chinese: 里基走到舞台的最前面，开始唱了起来。

sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.chinese: 由老式铅管输送的饮用水

sentences.chinese: 大多数工会成员投票赞成罢工。

sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.chinese: 他的衬衫上掉了一颗纽扣。

sentences.chinese: 她解开衬衫的纽扣。

sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.english: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.chinese: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

sentences.chinese: 通过鼠标的一点你就能查电子邮件。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound

sentences.english: a new concept in business travel
sentences.chinese: 商务旅行的新理念

sentences.english: our basic concepts of decent human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 我们对得体的人类行为的基本观念

sentences.english: It’s very simple, once you grasp the concept .
sentences.chinese: 你一旦掌握了这个概念之后就很简单了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 设想
detailed_translations.english: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

sentences.english: If my calculations are correct, we’re about ten miles from Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes

sentences.english: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.english: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

sentences.english: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a creature that looks like a human  skeleton  , used in paintings, stories etc to represent the fact that people die

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

sentences.english: He carefully explained the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 他仔细解释了程序。

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

sentences.english: Parents have expressed their concerns about their children’s safety.
sentences.chinese: 父母对自己孩子的安全表示忧虑。

sentences.chinese: 她表示有兴趣见见约克。

sentences.english: Many people have expressed their opposition to the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 许多人反对这些提议。

sentences.english: He first learnt to express himself through movement at his dance classes.
sentences.chinese: 他最初是在舞蹈班学会通过动作表达情感的。

sentences.english: Words can’t express (= it is impossible to describe ) how angry we felt.
sentences.chinese: 我们的愤怒无以言表。

sentences.english: London–Gatwick Express/Orient Express (=a fast train or bus which does a particular journey regularly)
sentences.chinese: 伦敦﹣盖特威克快车/东方快车

sentences.english: Send these books by express.
sentences.chinese: 把这些书用快递寄出去。

detailed_translations.english: to tell or show what you are feeling or thinking by using words, looks, or actions
a train or bus that does not stop in many places and therefore travels quickly

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。
